[b]Current mod version: 1.0[/b] [b]Supports Rimworld version: 1.2[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/zVWu5VE.png[/img]
[h1]You need a weapon? Right this way![/h1]
My goal is to add new weapons from the Halo Universe to Rimworld in a vanilla friendly way, meaning they fit artwise, lore-wise and value wise perfectly into Rimworld, as if they always have been part of it.
[b]"Rimworld: UNSC Armoury"[/b] adds some of the most iconic UNSC weapons as well as the cool combat helmet from Halo 3 to Rimworld. All weapons have been slightly redesigned to feel more modern, yet keep the core Halo aesthetic.
This mod is lightweight, it has no extra code and can be removed anytime.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/D5Lm54f.png[/img]
[b]"Rimworld: UNSC Armoury"[/b] adds the following content:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/VBhMUtT.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/HkfcAmw.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/DLt5nU5.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/WEGdaqX.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/ckRTHHr.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/tXr18Rq.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/jAHmbs4.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/W0lBRWJ.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/tDhufnw.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/f86Yz00.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/mij93ru.png[/img]
As of now, there are no patches. For people who ask for Combat Extended, I will not provide a patch, please ask the CE team.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2wIDWYF.png[/img]
Q: Do I need a new save for this? A: No.
Q: Do they spawn on enemies? A: Yes.
Q: Can they be crafted? A: Yes.
Q: Do they have their Halo sounds? A: No, they use the vanilla Rimworld sounds to better fit the game. A patch that adds the Halo sounds is in the works right now and can be added later without any problems!
Q: I cant find the spartan laser? A: Make sure you have Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Lasers installed!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/V9vnNPR.png[/img]
Textures are made by Alastair and me. XML and Patches are made by me.
